Date: Monday, 9/1/1982
Subject: Progress of Richard Purtell
Dear Sir,
Richard Purtell is hitting the ball well at A !
He has an AVG of .371, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Jaime Lucky is sick...
Diagnosis: Stomach Flu.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Tuesday, 9/30/1982
Subject: Roy Kwak injured
Hello Manager,
he had a little fight in a bar, and got knocked out.
Diagnosis: Knocked Out Teeth.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 4 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
